fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
Full name:             Ly Minh Tri 
Gender:                 Male 
Date of birth:        January 6, 1992 
Nationality:           Viet Nam 
Email:                    lmtkg1992@gmail.com 
Phone:                   (+84)0327942863 
Address:                01 Phu Hoa Street, Tan Binh District, HCMC 
University:            Bach Khoa University ( BKU) 
English:                 Read and write fluently, intermediate communication skill. 
EXPERIENCE:  
▪  5 years+ experience PHP Programming.   
▪  Framework: Magento 1, Magento 2, Phpfox, AngularJS 
▪  Software: MySQL, RabbitMQ ,Redis, Memcached, Solr Search, Jenkins, 
Docker. 
▪  Ability : Strong background in algorithm, logic thinking, design pattern. 
▪  Other skills : Coding Review, Refactoring Exist Code, PHPUnit Test, UML 
Design, Agile Methodology. 
▪  Research: Machine Learning and Computer Vision. 
▪  OS: Ubuntu, Centos. 
I have finished so many projects in a variety of subject.  I’m always eager to learn new 
things ,willing to confess my mistake and do my best to improve what I did.  
I would love to work in a young, professional environment. My goal is to become a 
good engineer with strategic vision and innovative solutions. 
WORKS: HIGHLIGHT PROJECTS 
  Working in University 
Thesis: Bus Finder Map Website 
Project description:        Bus Finder Map website is a website that help user can 
search routes for bus by keyword location in HCM city.  
The map shows street, name location and gives many 
solutions so user can select proper routes for them.  
Team size:                      2 
Skills:                              CodeIgniter framework,  KineticJS, MySQL. 
Responsibilities:              - Develop a part of core structural database and system. 
- Implement main task. 
         - Tutor and assign task to member. 
. 
Working in YouNet         March 2014 – October 2015 
Project: Business Directory 
Project description:         Business Directory provides Yelp-like features for niche 
social network. Members can create a business or claim a 
business created by other members. 
Roles:                             Developer. 
Team size:                      2 
Skills:                             PHPFOX, JQuery, Smarty. 
  Responsibilities:             Implement main task. 
Project: Auction 
Project description:        Auction is an Ebay-like module which allows members on 
your community to put up items for sale and have other 
users place bids to win, or make offer, buy now to directly 
buy the items 
Roles:                             Developer. 
Team size:                      2 
Skills:                             PHPFOX, JQuery, Smarty. 
  Responsibilities:             Implement main task. 
Working in Bluecom         October 2015 - November 2017 
Project: Lapp Japan 
Project description:        Lapp Japan is eCommerce site selling products in field of 
cable and connectivity. 
Roles:                             Developer. 
Team size:                      3 
Skills:                             Magento 1, Prototype js, MySQL. 
  Responsibilities:            - Implement main function. 
       - Develop, integrate calculation shipping fee system by SOAP 
service. 
       - Extract and migrate over 20000 products from CSV file. 
Project: All World Shop Shop 
Project description:        All World Shop Shop  is multiple site-ecommerce in 
multi-country selling various product based on Framework 
Magento 1 
Roles:                             Developer. 
Team size:                      3 
Skills:                             Magento1, Prototype js, MySQL, SOAP. 
Responsibilities:             - Implement main function. 
       - Extract ,transform and migrate (ETL) product data from 3 
sites Drupal Ecommerce and 6 site Oscommerce into Magento 1 
system. 
Project: Riki Ecommerce 
Project description:        Riki Ecommerce  is big site-ecommerce selling 
food,drinking for Nestle Corporation based on Framework 
Magento 2. 
Team size:                      18 
Roles:                             Senior Developer. 
Skills:                             Magento2, Knockout JS, MySQL, RabbitMQ, SOAP. 
Responsibilities:           - Implement main function for subscription product system. 
-
Implement customer system for synchronous data from 
other system via SOAP service. 
-
Implement and improve for shipping function 
      -
Implement function exporting file for BI System 
      -
Implement message queue system for handling 
asynchronous data 
      -
Implement multi-process for handling data in parallel for 
better performance. 
Working in Lotte Data Communication Company     November 2017 - Present 
Project:  Lotte E-commerce 
Project description:        Lotte E-commerce is project for Lotte.vn that is member of 
Lotte Corporation. Lotte.vn provides e-commerce services 
in VietNam. 
Team size:                      20 
Roles:                             Senior Developer. 
Skills:                             Magento2, Angular JS, MySQL, RabbitMQ. 
Responsibilities:           - Maintain , monitor and keep stable system. 
-
Develop new feature, take in charge in checkout-order 
system, shipping system, operation system. 
-
Optimize and refactor code. 
Education: 
University: University of Technology Ho Chi Minh City 
Degree : Bachelor of Engineering. 
Major: Computer Science.  
GPA: 7.4 
 Hobbies : Playing games, do exercise, reading books.
